r.s: Runkit7 : For all those things you.... probably shouldn't have been doing anyway.... but surely do!
r.d: Replace, rename, and remove user defined functions, methods, and constants. Define customized superglobal variables for general purpose use.
r.n: - Fix build failure in PECL releases due to missing files in the 4.0.0a1 archive. - Properly reference count references to file names in php 8.0 when copying functions
